name: mpgame
description:
This was a little prototype of a game I made in 6 hours, it is a local multiplayer hockey-esque game. You must shoot the ball into the opposing goal. Stop the enemy by delivering the ball using forcefields and speedboosts.

This game is unfinished, the game over screen was hastily put in and there may be errors.

(LEFT is Player 1 (RED), RIGHT is Player 2 (BLUE))

WASD/IJKL = Movement

Q/U = Place Forcefield

E/O = Throw Ball & Speedboost
